full_text: Set of knitted jacket and socks in seed st for baby and children, in DROPS Merino Extra Fine ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Size: 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months (2 - 3/4) years Bust: 48-54-60 (66-72) cm / 19”-21¼”-23 5/8” (26”-28 3/8”) Full length: 26-28-31 (33-36) cm / 10¼”-11”-12¼” (13”-14¼”) Materials: JACKET: DROPS MERINO EXTRA FINE from Garnstudio 150-200-200 (250-250) g color no 01, off-white DROPS MOTHER-OF-PEARL BUTTON no 523: 3 pcs. SOCKS: DROPS MERINO EXTRA FINE from Garnstudio 50-50-50 (100-100) g color no 01, off-white Needles: JACKET: DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE (60 cm / 24’’) size 4.5 mm / US 7 – or size needed to get 20 sts x 26 rows in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4’’ x 4’’. SOCKS: DROPS DOUBLE POINTED Needles size 3 mm / US 2 or 3 – or size needed to get 23 sts x 32 rows in moss st = 10 x 10 cm / 4’’ x 4’’. PATTERN LINKS: Italian version Norwegian version French version
name: Ravelry: b18-10 Miss Mossy pattern by DROPS design
